{{beyondbree: '''''Beyond Bree'' July 1986''' is an issue of ''[[Beyond Bree]]'', edited by [[Nancy Martsch]].

Includes an article/letter ("Notes on the Differences in Editions of The Hobbit Cited by Mr. David Cofield" by [[Christopher Tolkien]], pp. 1-3) that reproduces two pages from one of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]'s annotated copies of ''[[The Hobbit]]''.<ref>''An Illustrated Tolkien Bibliography'' at Tolkienbooks.net</ref>
